job_tasks.phrase: Opslaan, End-to-end responsibility for building data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of data engineering, focusing on the end-to-end creation of data pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: troubleshooting and resolving performance and reliability issues in data workflows
job_tasks.justification: Troubleshooting and resolving performance and reliability issues in data workflows falls under the operational management and maintenance of data systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure robust implementation of data governance frameworks, including access controls, data lineage, and compliance with regulations.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing frameworks for data governance, access controls, and lineage involves developing and integrating systems, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement architecture and technology solutions that enable data-driven decision-making across departments.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing architecture and technology solutions to enable data-driven decision-making involves building and integrating systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Coach junior IT colleagues on development standards, CI/CD processes, and code documentation.
job_tasks.justification: Coaching on CI/CD processes and development standards is related to the operational practices of software and data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Manage strategic architecture choices, security, resource efficiency (cost and optimization)
job_tasks.justification: Managing architecture choices, security, and resource efficiency relates to the operational and infrastructural aspects of managing data systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Act as the technical lead for projects across various departments
Support a high-performing IT team through coaching and knowledge-sharing
troubleshooting and resolving performance and reliability issues
Key role in driving the success of Data Engineering from ideation to the delivery of industry-leading products and solutions.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes data engineering, pipeline building, and operational aspects (CI/CD, troubleshooting) with mentions of Azure and Databricks. It lacks any specific mention of Generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, or related advanced AI modeling techniques.
